section.name: Accounting of sales returns.
section.p: At Jan 18 Bob sold 4 Pizza with bacon frozen and 4 Pizza with cheese frozen to Funny coffee shop. Bob fill sales invoice (see Accounting of Sales.)

At Jan 19 Bob was confirmed what "Funny coffee shop" is bankrupt and he receive sales return 2 Pizza with bacon frozen and 2 Pizza with cheese frozen. Bob print full sales invoice report to figure price and cost which must be same for return:
Then Bob fill sales return according sales invoice:

Sales returns is business expense (deducting income tax). If according law of your country accrual method means that business expense occurs when you received document (prove) even though you haven't received goods yet (in same day), then (in that case) switch off method "SalesReturn, Debit SalesReturns.InvItemCategory Credit ReturnsPayable.DebtorCreditor" in accounting settings and make these deducting income accounting entries by hand.
